His success doesn't surprise me but maybe the magnitude and the fact he became the global star that he has is pretty astonishing but not surprising. You can like who you like and hate you hate but I can never understand the hatred for this guy. I've never seen the guy shit the bed in the ring, I've never seen not elevate the guy he's in the ring with. He is not boring, I don't understand the hate. I get not liking the guy but there are people who just despise him. He is doing something, he is touching some nerve inside you. I'm a John Cena fan and I think he is quite good for the professional wrestling business.
